## Checklist

<!-- Go over all the following points, and put an `x` in all the boxes that apply -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have run `make format` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `make lint` and fixed any issues
- [ ] I have run `make type-check` and there are no errors
- [ ] I have run `make test` and all tests pass
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass locally

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes (Google style)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if appropriate)
- [ ] I have added examples if adding new features

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have added integration tests if needed
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Reproducibility

- [ ] I have updated K-Codex schema if needed
- [ ] I have documented any changes to experiment configuration

- [ ] New experiments logged via K-Codex

### Security
